vpnInterface.tooltip: You should be able to leave this field empty. This applet will try to detect this.

vpnName.tooltip:
This information is automatically changed when connecting to a VPN.
It therefore contains the name of the last VPN to which you connected.

connectAtStartup.description: Connect to VPN as this applet starts.
connectAtStartup.tooltip: Checking this allows this applet to try to connect to the last VPN at start-up.

reconnect.description: Try to reconnect to VPN when it shuts down incidentally.
reconnect.tooltip: Checking this allows this applet to try to reconnect to VPN when it shuts down incidentally.

refreshInterval-spinner.tooltip: Increase or decrease this spinner value to change the refresh interval - use a slow refresh (ie high value) if you have a slow machine.

displayType.tooltip: This feature offers the Classic (default) display with icon and text, and compact display (Icon Only).

useSoundAlert.description: Emit a sound alert when VPN shuts down.
useSoundAlert.tooltip: Checking this allows this applet to emit a sound alert when VPN shuts down.

useSoundAlertAtBeginning.description: Emit this sound alert when this Applet starts, if VPN is down.
useSoundAlertAtBeginning.tooltip: Check this if you want to emit this sound alert when this Applet starts, if VPN is down.

stopTransmission.description: Shut down properly Transmission as soon as VPN falls.
stopTransmission.tooltip: Checking this allows this applet to shut down Transmission (if it's running) as soon as VPN falls.

restartTransmission.description: Try to restart Transmission as soon as VPN restarts.
restartTransmission.tooltip: Checking this allows this applet to restart Transmission (if it was stopped by this applet) as soon as VPN restarts.

keybinding.description: Set the keybinding here to activate/deactivate the last used VPN.
